import React, { createRef } from 'react' import { useScreenshot } from 'use-react-screenshot' function Shot(props) { const ref = createRef(null) const getImage = () => takeScreenshot(ref.current) const [image, takeScreenshot] = useScreenshot() return (

use-react-screenshot

hook by @vre2h which allows to create screenshots

) } export default Shot
